file_content.text: Who dares barge into my palace unannounced?
They aren't being eaten. Why aren't they being eaten! You! Feed Bonethrasher!
Enough! I grow tired of this. Kill them! Everyone kill them!
Beastmaster! Throw open the cages. I want to see a feeding frenzy!
Bonethrasher was the envy of the Cartel! He was to father a dynasty of arena beasts!
Fools? Assassins? Come and present yourself!
Allow me to welcome you to my home.
Bonethrasher, my pet, come greet our guests!
You will have the privilege of dining with the undefeated pit fighter of our age!
